idea: We are all about the revolution in the startup development industry. The name of our company may have struck interest in you and you might want to know what the name means. name: The 90/10 Company

idea:
It is our earnest endeavour to create a hygienic, clean and sustainable environment for all to co-exist in harmony. We are committed to developing innovative products of international quality to contribute towards making a real difference.


Tithisha Innovations swear by its motto - “Be Responsible”; where we believe that in order to safeguard nature we all have to collaborate and create a “Hygiene oriented socio-cultural order”.


Innovation is at the core of what we do, our relentless commitment to innovate has led us to create a comprehensive portfolio of health care products.


Problem statement:

At a time when our nation is spending thousands of crores on ramping up cleanliness models like ‘Swachh Sarvekshan' and raising awareness on the importance of cleanliness and sanitization, spitting continues to be a serious menace. It has been proved by numerous healthcare experts that spitting is associated with the spread of dreaded air borne diseases such as Coronavirus, Tuberculosis, Flu, Hepatitis B to name a few. Despite knowing that Covid-19 can spread through the droplets of sputum and saliva, numerous “Spitidiots” are still seen spitting in public places.


Our Approach:

We want to see a “New India” which is innovative and cautious towards human life and we feel responsible to protect and safeguard the splendour and freshness of both our environment and the world we live in; hence, we came up with a novel product to tackle this menace. A product which has the potential to bring in a positive socio-cultural effect and impact the psyche of spitters and non-spitters alike.


Proposed solution:

Product Name: SafeThoo – Our novel spit bags are inspired by the traditional spittoon (Thook-daan), but with a modern twist.
name: Tithisha Innovations Pvt Ltd

idea:
Designed to serve an unique lending experience. We provide one stop solution for your credit requirements, whether it is for your dream home, business, personal, education or enhancing your credit limit. We are committed to the financial progress of all our stakeholders.

It is our endeavour to assist our customers with easy, appropriate and timely credit solutions. We believe every customer situation is unique and requirement is different, so we provide tailor made solutions to all our customer by working with financial institutions.

We look forward to contribute our bit in making your dreams a reality by providing UNICUS credit solutions.
name: Unicus Fintech Solutions Private Limited

idea:
“Demla Retail Private Limited” is one of the leading manufacturers of High Back Chair, Gaming Chair etc. We offer these to our customers at market leading rates.
Cellbell is one of the brand of Demla Retail Private Limited and its gaming chairs are here to satisfy the urge of the gamers. Our wellness resource for players who want to play healthier. The gaming chairs are helping the gamers to be better than yesterday. As a cellbell, we want to see a better tomorrow with you all.
Cellbell gaming chairs are superior to standard gaming chairs in both comfort and durability which is designed to fit every gamer. Cellbell gaming chairs will provide support whenever you have to be at the desk for a long period of time.
To achieve a perfect gaming experience the Cellbell gaming chairs focus on support that minimizes fatigue and maintains posture. If you need to get stuff done our gaming chairs can work as both work-from-home chair and gaming chair as well.
The Cellbell comes with a highly ergonomic headrest, backrest, and armrest, which ensures for longer peak performance. It ensures minimizing strains from improper posture, maximum responsiveness as your arm position should be ideal to access mouse and keyboard and by keeping your back comfortable.The cellbell gaming chairs have found a place for countless amazing gamers and it’s popularity shows no sign of stopping.
The Cellbell gaming chairs are designed to provide a high level of comfort with beautiful design and colour for it’s user. It is definitely an ideal choice for both office and gaming needs. The gaming chairs are comfortable for studying too as it allows you to adjust that chair’s position accordingly for reading or writing.
The Cellbell gaming chairs have some uniquely created features such as, Free delivery Pan India, 6 months extended warranty, Assured quality no cost EMI and Assembly within 48 hours.
name: DEMLA RETAIL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: It is a story telling platform where knowledge is shared by telling stories.

idea:
We use real time tech to take garment job-work manufacturing directly to village level craft-hubs (craft clusters).

We leverage digitization and high level mobile phone penetration in rural areas for real-time production monitoring and support. Leveraging tech increases process efficiency, quality and turnarounds times. We also invest in design and innovation with constant launches of design portfolios and artisan trainings.

We create jobs at village level to enable artisans to access dignified livelihoods at their homes. This also greatly helps age-old crafts to not only survive but thrive.
name: MIRANDOLA DESIGNS INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Adok Infrastructure Llp is a Limited Liability Partnership firm incorporated on 30 March 2021.
